com.topcoder.util.file.templatesource
Class FileTemplateSource

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.util.file.templatesource.FileTemplateSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
TemplateSource
public class FileTemplateSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements TemplateSource

Implementation of a template source that retrieves template from the file system. In this implementation the name of the template is the filename of the template.

Thread-Safety: This class should be implemented in a thread-safe manner.

Since:
2.1
Version:
3.0
Author:
adic, roma, ShindouHikaru, biotrail, gniuxiao, TCSDEVELOPER

Method Detail

getTemplate

public java.lang.String getTemplate(java.lang.String fileName)
                             throws TemplateSourceException
Retrieves the text of the template stored in the given file.

Specified by:
getTemplate in interface TemplateSource
Parameters:
fileName - the name of the template file
Returns:
the text of the template
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is null or empty
TemplateSourceException - indicates an error while retrieving the template:
  • there isn't a file with the given name
  • wraps an I/O exception while reading the file
Since:
2.0

addTemplate

public void addTemplate(java.lang.String templateName,
                        java.lang.String templateText)
                 throws TemplateSourceException
Adds the template to the template source with the given name. If there is a template with that name, it is replaced.

Specified by:
addTemplate in interface TemplateSource
Parameters:
templateName - the name of the template
templateText - the text of the template
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is null or empty
TemplateSourceException - indicates an error while adding the template:
  • wraps some implementation specific exception (I/O exception)
Since:
2.0

removeTemplate

public void removeTemplate(java.lang.String templateName)
                    throws TemplateSourceException
Removes the template with the given name from the template source.

Specified by:
removeTemplate in interface TemplateSource
Parameters:
templateName - the name of the template
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is null or empty
TemplateSourceException - indicates an error while removing the template:
  • there isn't a template with the given name
  • wraps some implementation specific exception (I/O exception)
Since:
